Samsung Galaxy Watch5 44mm Smart Watch

The Samsung Galaxy Watch5 has been designed to help you learn more so you can achieve more. The powerful 3-in-1 Samsung BioActive sensor effectively controls three health sensors. Sensors for bioelectrical impedance analysis, electrical heart rate (ECG), and optical heart rate. It goes beyond tracking steps and calories to offer actionable insights on everything from your running style to your heart rate. The Galaxy Watch5 tracks your movements so you can just slip it on and get working out. With swimming added to automatic tracking you now get seven exercises, while manual tracking works for all activities for dozens you can track. The running coach function gives you actionable advice in real-time. It comes with a thin, light design. The Super AMOLED display is all screen from edge to edge. The touch bezel allows you to easily navigate with a quick turn, touch, or tap.

Samsung 3-in-1 BioActive sensor

The powerful 3-in-1 Samsung BioActive sensor controls three health sensors effectively. Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis sensor, Electrical Heart sensor (ECG), and Optical Heart Rate sensor.

Up to 45% charge in 30 mins

It takes about 30 minutes to charge from 0% to 45%. Yes, you read that correctly. You'll be ready to go in no time thanks to a larger battery than its predecessors and fast charging.

IP68 and 5ATM water and dust rating

The Galaxy Watch5 goes where you go with an IP68 and 5ATM water and dust rating plus military-grade durability to handle a range of conditions, so you can keep it on to go farther and experience more. The Samsung Watch comes with no Warranty.

full_description:
Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm Super AMOLED Smart Watch

The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm Smart Watch is a perfect combination of style and functionality. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity sync easily with your smartphone for easy communication and data transmission. Play your favorite music on the go thanks to support for MP3, AAC, and WAV, among other audio formats. This Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm Smart Watch, outfitted with cutting-edge location technologies such as GPS, Glonass, Beidou, and Galileo, offers precise positioning for outdoor activities and navigation. With a resolution of 480 x 480 pixels and a color depth of 16 million, its bright 1.5-inch Super AMOLED display produces clear images that make every interaction clear. With a powerful 1.4GHz dual-core processor, 2GB of RAM, and 16GB of storage, it provides lag-free performance and lots of room for files and programs. Advanced health and fitness tracking functions are made possible by the Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm Smart Watch's wide range of sensors, which include an accelerometer, barometer, heart rate sensor, and more. Its 425mAh battery ensures long-lasting power for all-day use, with up to 40 hours of usage time when the Always On Display (AOD) is off and up to 30 hours while it is on.

1.5" Super AMOLED Display

See up to 20% more information at a glance on this display. The largest screen yet on the Galaxy Watch and greater room for personalization with customizable watch faces are made possible by the narrower black margin of up to 30%. Better yet, the watch that knows you the best is returning with enhanced sleep monitoring and a more customized health experience. With sleep coaching now accessible on the Galaxy Watch 6, get a good night's sleep to start your day.

Thinner Bezel

This leaner, more streamlined form combines comfort and style. The new Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 has a smaller watch shape, which makes it more comfortable to wear. The classic circular design and seamless fit are a lightweight, incredibly comfortable trick up your sleeve.

Switching bands is One-Click easy

Press the band release button on your Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 to remove the watch bands quickly. With a single touch, swap them out to transition from gym to party wear. With a pleasing click when it's reattached, the band guide facilitates alignment.

Sapphire Crystal glass

Rain or shine, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm Smart Watch is prepared for everything. Your watch is tough enough to accompany you on your excursions thanks to its IP68 and 5ATM ratings, and its ultra-durable Sapphire Crystal glass creates a robust and resilient watch display.

Most Powerful Exynos W930 5mm Processor

The Galaxy Watch 6 now launches apps 18% faster than it did before, thanks to an improved processor. It therefore follows your every move, whether you're out for a run to start the day or retiring for the evening. The watch can function for up to 40 hours on a single full charge. You can quickly charge the watch to 45% in only thirty minutes, so you're ready to go exploring outside or take a well-earned nap in bed.

Safety Features

In the event of an emergency, your Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Bluetooth 44mm smartwatch is ready to go. If you stumble, Fall Detection will detect it and inquire as to whether you require assistance. To send an SOS to emergency services in other situations, just press the home button five times. With a single swipe on the lock screen, you can instantly get your medical information when help arrives. Don't worry; you're in capable hands now. Pose obstacles and show off your competitive nature. Bring your exercise partners along, and push each other to reach new heights. Together, celebrate advancements, successes, and personal records.

24 Hours Heart Monitoring

With a heart monitoring package that gives you peace of mind, you can focus on your day and reduce your worries. While wearing your Galaxy Watch 6, the integrated PPG sensor occasionally monitors your heart rate and heart rhythm. If your heart rate is too high or too low, it will notify you. Including a fast blood pressure check in your daily routine will help you maintain a healthy lifestyle. With the Samsung Galaxy Watch 6, you can monitor and measure your blood pressure directly on your wrist. With the Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA) sensor on your Galaxy Watch 6, you can gather data on your body whenever you'd like without having to deal with bulky machines. These metrics can assist you in adopting a data-driven strategy to more effectively monitor your body and health and create customized exercise objectives.

Monitor Your Fitness Journey

With the Galaxy Watch 6, keep track of all of your physical achievements and monitor your overall progress. You can track your actions for more than 90 activities, such as yoga and indoor swimming, or you can design your own unique routine. Did you forget to press start? To ensure you don't lose important data, your watch will automatically recognize and record specific workouts like walking, jogging, and now even cycling.

Remotely Snap Your Galaxy Z Flip5 Photos

Connect your Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Smartwatch to your Galaxy Z Flip5 to take close-up or far-away pictures of your healthy self. With the Flex mode and Camera Controller on the Galaxy Z Flip5, you can effortlessly flick between photo and video mode, as well as zoom in and out, all from the convenience of your wrist. Next, press the watch's shutter button to snap a picture.

GPS Points You in The Right Direction

You can stay on track by turning on the GPS embedded into your watch on Google Maps. As a result, you may easily locate your way home even if your activities take you far. With your smartphone securely tucked away in your pocket, take advantage of a wide range of well-known third-party apps, like Audible, WhatsApp, Spotify, and more, all on your Samsung Galaxy Watch 6.

Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro 44mm Smart Watch

The Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro is a high-end smartwatch designed for individuals who want to stay connected and organized while on the go. It features a sleek and modern design with a large, bright, and sharp display that makes it easy to navigate the watch's various functions. The watch offers a range of features and capabilities, including the ability to track fitness and health data such as heart rate, calories burned, steps taken, and more. It also has a built-in GPS, allowing users to track their outdoor activities accurately.

GPS Route Tracking

The Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro comes with an all-new Route workout feature that lets you import GPX format workout routes from your smartphone to your watch, syncing your route list.

Samsung 3-in-1 BioActive sensor

The powerful 3-in-1 Samsung BioActive sensor controls three health sensors effectively. Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis sensor, Electrical Heart sensor (ECG), and Optical Heart Rate sensor. The BioActive Sensor can record your blood pressure, helping you manage high or low blood pressure.

Ultimate Durability

Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Pro is 2x stronger with a scratch-resistant Sapphire crystal face. It also has a water-resistant, titanium body that has got your back, from mountaintops to river rapids.
